name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a detail-oriented Senior Surveyor Engineer with 8+ years of experience, I excel in ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and conducting thorough inspections for mechanical systems including **lift** and **crane** operations. My strong documentation skills complement my effective time management and customer interaction abilities, ensuring clarity and satisfaction in every project. With a tech-savvy approach, I utilize **tablets** and **smartphones** to streamline inspections and documentation processes. My background in software engineering enhances my problem-solving capabilities, enabling me to leverage data insights for improved operational efficiency.
